Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 24th overall pick, by Oakland in 1968...
Injured on 8/19/1969 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/2/1972 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/29/1973...
Injured on 8/11/1975 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 6/10/1977 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1978, going 6-0, 2.87...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1981, going 4-0, 0.89...
Traded from Oakland to New York (N) on 6/9/1982 (Going to NYM: P B. Slayback. Going to OAK: 2B V. Law)...
Injured on 7/13/1982 with a Tender Elbow, out for one week...
